Improvements.Improvement: Create a utility method for setting the factory attribute
Improvements.Description: The setting of attributes is a repetitive process and could be abstracted into a utility method. This utility method accepts a factory instance, an attribute name and a default value as parameters and sets the attribute for the factory.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract the common error message into a variable
Improvements.Description: The error message is repetitive and could be extracted into a variable. This will make the code cleaner and easier to maintain.
